verses.text: \w At|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Merodach-baladan|strong="H4757"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H2470"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w recovered|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w armor|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* treasures: \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w the|strong="H3470"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w unto|strong="H5030"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5030"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* said \w these|strong="H4428"\w* men? \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* whence \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* \w unto|strong="H5030"\w* thee? \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* said, \w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w come|strong="H7350"\w* \w from|strong="H7350"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* country \w unto|strong="H5030"\w* \w me|strong="H4100"\w*, even \w from|strong="H7350"\w* Babylon.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w*, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w answered|strong="H1697"\w*, \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* treasures \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shown|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*:

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w coming|strong="H2009"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* store \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Babylon: \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w*, whom \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w beget|strong="H3205"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \w Good|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w moreover|strong="H1961"\w*, \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* truth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
